content.LabelText: Sleep and skip to next day

objects.name: Interactions
objects.string:
Interactions:

1.  "f" is used to plant cacti
2.  "g" is used to collect grown cacti
3.  "r" is used to collect 1-3 seeds from fully grown cacti
4.  "c" is used to convert 4 cacti into fertilizer
5.  "e" is used to collect water from the well that is used on fertilized land
6. 1 fertilizer can be used on a plot of land to allow for planting

parameters: "Your farm has been blessed by rain!"
"Your farm has been wrecked by a sandstorm!"
"It is a normal hot, sunny day!"
"You collected enough Cacti to escape! Congratulations!!"
